1911 Obaks for sale

Raymer - Victoria - very light front crease. Red ink on top corner.  Paper loss on back.  Very nice front image   $45

Powell - San Francisco - no creasing.  Paper loss on back  $60

Reddick - Victoria - has crease, does not go through the back.  paper attached on back.  great card if you know how to remove.  $45

Miller - Oakland -  paper separating on right border.  paper attached and small loss  on reverse.  $45

Mahoney - Sacramento - light crease.  Very nice front.  Back has paper loss $60.

Mensor - Portland - crease.  small glue remants on reverse.  $40 


Paypal accepted.  

Email is   [url]deadballera@comcast.net[/url]
